articles.title: New York UPS driver protects boy's Christmas toy by hiding it behind trash bins, video shows
articles.description: A UPS driver was caught on camera trying to hide a large package in an attempt not to spoil a Christmas surprise for a young boy inside the New York home.
articles.content:
A UPS driver was caught on camera trying to hide a large package in an attempt not to spoil a Christmas surprise for a young boy inside the New York home.

articles.title: Trump warns Newsom: If California homeless crisis persists, feds 'will get involved'
articles.description: President Trump issued strong warnings to California Governor Gavin Newsom Wednesday, threatening federal intervention if Newsom is unable to solve the homeless crisis taking over his state.
articles.content:
President Trump issued a warning to California Gov. Gavin Newsom on Wednesday, threatening federal intervention if Newsom is unable to solve his state's homeless crisis.

articles.title: Wisconsin waitress gets $1,300 tip after valiant cancer fight alongside her sister
articles.description: A group of women in Wisconsin surprised a waitress, a cancer survivor who had lost her sister to the disease in October, with a $1,300 tip for Christmas.
articles.content:
A group of women in Wisconsin surprised a waitress, a cancer survivor who had lost her sister to the disease in October, with a $1,300 tip for Christmas.

articles.content: Kanye West is one of the most polarizing figures in all of entertainment. Whether it is his support for President Trump or his musical antics, Kanye certainly knows how to keep people talking. Here are some of the "Jesus Is King" rapper's top moments of 2019.… [+5933 chars]
